column2: == Description == Acer palmatum is a deciduous shrub or small tree reaching height of 6 to 10 m ( 20 to 33 ft ) , rarely 16 metre ( 52 ft ) , often growing a an understory plant in shady woodland .
It is also frequently on crop bank or in sloped arid area at height from 1500 to 2450 meter ( 4920 to 8040 ft ) above sea level .
Flower stalk are 10–20 cm ( 3.9–7.9 in ) tall .
== Description == The eastern redbud typically grows to 6–9 m ( 20–30 ft ) tall with an 8–10 m ( 26–33 ft ) spread .
A 10-year-old tree will generally be around 5 m ( 16 ft ) tall .

It ha been found in Texas , New Mexico , Aguascalientes , Chihuahua , Coahuila , Durango , Guanajuato , Hidalgo , México State , Nuevo León , Oaxaca , Puebla , Querétaro , San Luis Potosí , Zacatecas , Tamaulipas , and Veracruz.Chrysactinia mexicana is an evergreen subshrub up to 80 cm ( 32 inch ) tall .
== Description == Coreopsis lanceolata is a perennial plant sometimes attaining a height of over 60 cm ( 2 foot ) .
It is a multiple-branching shrub growing to 5–7 m ( 16–23 ft ) tall with an open , spreading , irregular habit , only rarely forming a small tree .
== Description == Echinacea specie are herbaceous , drought-tolerant perennial plant growing up to 140 cm or 4 foot , in height .
Flowering stalk can be up to 250 cm tall , with long branch .
== Description == Hydrangea quercifolia is a coarse-textured deciduous shrub growing to 3–12 foot ( 0.91–3.66 m ) tall with an open crown .
=== Flowers === Hydrangea quercifolia flower are borne in erect panicle 6–12 in ( 15.2–30.5 cm ) tall and 3–5 in ( 7.6–12.7 cm ) wide at branch tip .
It life up to both it scientific and common name , reaching only 10–30 cm tall but often spreading several metre wide .

== Botany == It is an understory plant in China , Japan , and Korea occurring in shady forest at elevation of 330–4,600 ft ( 101–1,402 m ) .It is a tufted , grass-like perennial which typically grows 30–45 cm ( 12–18 in ) tall and feature clump of strap-like , arching , glossy , dark green leaf to ½ inch wide ( 1.3 cm ) .
It is an herbaceous perennial grass , growing to 0.8–2 m ( 3–7 ft ) tall , rarely 4 m ( 13 ft ) , forming dense clump from an underground rhizome .
The leaf are 18–75 cm ( 7–30 in ) tall and 0.3–2 cm broad .

a it is useful a a green screen ( instead of Pampass grass ) , erosion control , water retention and nest material for many specie of birdsThis specie is a perennial grass forming clump of erect stem up to 1.5 meter tall .
== Description == Oleander grows to 2–6 m ( 6.6–19.7 ft ) tall , with erect stem that splay outward a they mature ; first-year stem have a glaucous bloom , while mature stem have a grayish bark .
The much-branched plant may reach 3-ft tall and a bit wider .
== Description == Wild blue phlox is a semi-evergreen perennial growing 25–50 cm ( 10–20 in ) tall with opposite , unstalked , hairy leaf 2.5–5 cm ( 1–2 in ) in length and ovate-lanceolate in shape .
== Description == Phoenix reclinata is a dioecious clumping palm , producing multiple stem from 7.5 to 15 m in height and 30 cm in width .

It is most commonly known for it cultivar 'Bradford ' , widely planted throughout the United States and increasingly regarded a an invasive species.Pyrus calleryana is deciduous , growing to 5 to 8 m ( 16 to 26 ft ) tall , often with a conical to rounded crown .

In it first year , a new , unbranched stem ( `` primocane '' ) grows vigorously to it full height of 1.5–2.5 m ( 5.0–8.3 foot ) , bearing large pinnately compound leaf with five or seven leaflet , but usually no flower .
It is a perennial subshrub growing 4 to 5 ft ( 1.2 to 1.5 m ) tall , spreading into a large patch through it spreading root .
